metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5694 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Designate does not enforce the DNS protocol limit concerning record set sizes

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5694` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

designate - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-agent - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-api - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-central - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-common - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-mdns - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-pool-manager - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-sink - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-zone-manager - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
python-designate - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: designate package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1').
